Invocation Name: my loopo
des:
The MyLoopo skill is the newest of a number of digital innovations WOLF-Garten has introduced in the past (the Loopo mobile app and the MyLoopo web application)!

If your Loopo robotic mower comes with a GSM module, this new skill enables you to operate your Loopo by simply using your voice. The following voice commands are available:
@ Start mowing
@ Stop mowing and return to the Base Station
@ Check mower status
@ Check when and how was mower's last operation
@ Check the next departure time
@ Enable the automatic scheduled departure 
@ Disable the automatic scheduled departure


HOW TO GET STARTED:
1) Create your Wolf-Garten account by registering in the Loopo mobile app or in the MyLoopo web application. If you are already registered with WOLF-Garten, then skip this step
2) Enable MyLoopo skill on your Amazon Echo or Echo Dot device
3) Link the skill to your Wolf-Garten account by logging in with your email and password
4) Make sure your Loopo mower is properly installed and ready to mow.
5) Say "Alexa, ask my Loopo what it is doing". The skill will reply with the updated status of your mower.
6) Say "Alexa, ask my Loopo for help." The skill will reply with all available options for the voice commands.


THIS IS THE FULL LIST OF AVAILABLE VOICE COMMANDS (with expected response times):
"Alexa, Ask my Loopo if it likes mowing" (1-3 seconds)
"Alexa, Ask my Loopo how it is doing" (1-3 seconds)
"Alexa, Ask my Loopo when it worked last" (3-5 seconds)
"Alexa, Ask my Loopo how its last operation was" (3-5 seconds)
"Alexa, Ask my Loopo what it is doing" (10-15 seconds)
"Alexa, Tell my Loopo to enable automatic operation" (10-15 seconds)
"Alexa, Ask my Loopo when it will mow next" (10-15 seconds)
"Alexa, Tell my Loopo to disable automatic operation" (10-15 seconds)
"Alexa, Tell my Loopo to start mowing" (10-15 seconds)
"Alexa, Tell my Loopo to stop mowing" (10-15 seconds)
"Alexa, Tell my Loopo to go home" (10-15 seconds)
"Alexa, Ask my Loopo for help" (1-3 seconds)


COMPATIBILITY & LIMITATIONS:
- Your Loopo robotic mower needs to be equipped with a GSM module to fully utilize the MyLoopo skill.
- Certain commands (such as start mowing, stop mowing, go home, etc.) will only work with the latest generation (UDP) of the GSM module.
- If the skill is unable to connect with your mower, it will prompt the following message: "I'm sorry, your Loopo is currently not responding. Please try again later."
- If the database of your mower's recent operations is temporarily unavailable, the skill will respond with: "I'm sorry, there is currently no response from the database. Please try again later."
